target: The address is cambridge leisure park, clifton way. It is a cinema. I do not know the entrance fee, unfortunately.
context: <user>  Hi! Can you help me find some places to go on the south side of the city? I'm super bored! <system>  I am happy to help. There are several types of places to go in the South. Parks, theatre, cinema, museum, nightclub. What sounds good to you? <user>  I don't have a preference. Could you make a recommendation? <system>  How about a nightclub or cinema? There's also a great museum. <user>  Anything is fine whatever is most popular. <system>  Sure, Cineworld Cinema will be great. What information do you need about this attraction? <user>  Can I get the address, entrance fee and attraction type please? <system>
